issue.title: [Website] Add FAQ page about project
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-973](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-973). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As some suggested initial topics for the FAQ:

- How Apache Arrow is related to Apache Parquet (the difference between a "storage format" and an "in-memory format" causes confusion)
- How is Arrow similar to / different from Flatbuffers and Cap'n Proto
- How Arrow uses Flatbuffers (I have had people incorrectly state to me things like "Arrow is just Flatbuffers under the hood")

Any other ideas?

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-973?focusedCommentId=16860133) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4490
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4490>
